body.name: Laundry Egg Spring Blossom, 70 Loads
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 15% on your first Subscribe and Save order.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 🧺 MAKE LAUNDRY A BREEZE: Simply pop an ecoegg Laundry Egg on top of the clothes in the drum. The Laundry Egg is designed to last for up to 70 Washes and after that, simply refill with Laundry Egg Refills.

🤔 HOW DOES IT WORK? Using two types of mineral pellets plus a small amount of detergent encased in a recyclable egg, the ecoegg Laundry Egg provides brilliant cleaning for light and dark washes every time!

🌍 KINDER TO THE ENVIRONMENT AND YOUR POCKET: Helping you reduce consumption of single-use plastic bottles while costing just 14p per wash (10p when you refill). No more powder, pods, gel, or liquid clogging up your washing machine.

🥰 PERFECT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: Our dermatologically tested and hypoallergenic laundry solution contains no enzymes, making the ecoegg Laundry Egg perfect for those with allergies or susceptible to detergent rashes.
💡 INNOVATIVE: Ecoegg are passionate about producing innovative products that help to reduce single use plastic, are kinder to the environment, kind to your skin… and pocket.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #57,488 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #357 in Liquid Laundry Detergent

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ecoegg Laundry egg The refillable ecoegg Laundry Egg Replaces both laundry detergent and fabric conditioner. Simply pop it in the drum of your machine with your laundry, and let it do its thing! With no mess, and no measuring it is super easy to use. Available in Fresh Linen, Spring Blossom and Fragrance Free

The ecoegg Laundry Trio will help turn your laundry routine, green! First, deep clean your machine with our kinder ecoegg Washing Machine Detox Tablets, next wash your laundry with your ecoegg Laundry Egg, and finish with drying with your ecoegg Dryer Eggs that reduce drying time but up to 28%.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I love that I don't have to use wasteful plastic bottles and it frees up more space too. Clothes smell clean and are soft, I have super sensitive skin and it does not make me itch or break out. The scent is subtle and not over powering, although I wish it was just a bit stronger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this
reviews.reviewText: This is so good, I’m so happy about this great alternative that I could cry. I got linen scented & it isn’t overtly scented WHICH I LOVE. Only downside is it has to dry between washes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not an Easy Egg to Crack
reviews.reviewText: I was genuinely excited about this particular product, to simplify laundry. The problem is, accessing this egg is not simple. I cannot get it open. I first tried the instructions, point by point. Nope. The instructions indicate it should open with a simple push and twist.... which led to breaking my natural nail off, but not opening the egg. Apparently, the company thinks this egg is from a golden goose, so is protected by the highest security.I alternately have tried using the back of a spoon, a blunt knife handle, and a chopstick to depress the latch button. I am still denied access.Imagining what it would be like for an older person, or physically challenged person, to attempt this simple task triggers sympathy and anxiety.Annnyywaaay. I'll be returning it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wish I had purchased an Eco egg years ago. I would have saved a fortune in laundry detergents.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use...nice fragrance... efficient cleaning of all my laundry.... What's not to like!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it
reviews.reviewText: First off the Egg was already open with beads poured in egg. It states that i would have to do that. Also, it was supposed to have a Spring scent and it came with no scent. Also, washed my clothes and it didnt seem to do a thing so I had to run my machine again with real soap. I have the feeling I wasn't the only one dissappointed with this egg as they probably returned this one and I then received it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This is the first time I used anything like this to wash my clothes. The first thing I notice was that the clothes feels a lot more softer but it doesn’t smell like anything 😞 and does not get any stains out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The product does not work
reviews.reviewText: A waste of money does not work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I had no idea that this would work, especially with a washer that only uses a small amount of water. I have done four loads of laundry and I like it. As I age I am becoming mor and more sensitive to smells and skin irritation, I have not reacted to the egg! It leaves no smell on my clothes and they are not stiff , which I thought they might be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Been using this for a year now, lots of money saved on normal washing tabs and no difference in cleaning. Great smell too

Llevamos tiempo usando este cachivache en casa. Funciona bien para limpieza. No busques perfumes pero para limpieza sí que vale. No usas químicos o no tantos como con detergentes y ahorras un montón de dinero. Es un buen producto. Cuidado con perder las bolas negras porque no hay recambio sin comprar el huevo entero. Por lo demás, lo recomiendo

reviews.reviewTitle: Recensione dopo 2 mesi: bucato pulito e sicuro, stop alla chimica.
reviews.reviewText: Ho acquistato questo ecoegg un po' scettica, infatti ho scelto il formato da 70 lavaggi per spendere meno e provarlo. Dopo 2 mesi di utilizzo sono molto soddisfatta e sicuramente una volta esaurito comprerò la ricarica. Il bucato con ecoegg risulta pulito e morbido senza l'utilizzo di alcun additivo, anche se personalmente utilizzo ancora un poco di detersivo in caso di carichi di lavatrice particolarmente abbondanti e/o sporchi. Il consumo di detersivo è comunque ridotto drasticamente.Per chi è abituato ad usare l'ammorbidente, probabilmente dovrà continuare a farlo, perché comunque il bucato non esce così profumato e morbido. Essendo io attenta dal punto di vista ecologico e salutistico, non ho mai usato ammorbidente o profumatori, e li ho sostituiti solo con acido citrico diluito al 10% per avere comunque capi morbidi. Devo dire che da quando uso ecoegg il bucato esce ben più "ammorbidito" rispetto a prima.Per riassumere, ecoegg funziona molto bene, ma per esserne davvero soddisfatti bisogna rinunciare a certa chimica dei detersivi e ammorbidenti per fare una scelta più ecologica e salutare, solo così si apprezzerà un bucato pulito e sicuro, e non profuatissimo morbidissimo e dannodissimo.
Wäscht rein wie es soll und duftet leicht. Hab nun schon ca 10 Wäschen gemacht und ist noch genug drinnen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have tried this product a few times and it seems to clean cloths well, cloths come out brighter looking, only draw back is there is very little purfume smell so I tend to put those smelly crystals in the wash as well to compensate but I don't bother with detergent or conditioner, although I do use detergent for sheets because I want a really good clean and not sure how good this cleans heavy soiled stuff, still yet to put that to the test but for to freshen up clothes that are not stained it's great. I will try dirty cloths just to see how well it works and maybe give another review a little later but so far happy enough with product and I like the economy side of it and it's good for the environment so win win 😁👍
